name: Kenneth Santillan
title: BUDTENDER
coverLetter:
The reason I will stand out is I put all I have and all of my heart to the things that matters the most to me. I believe that it is the key to fulfillment in life. 

“Slow and steady wins the race, I’m only competing with myself!”
